original_text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.
korean_text: 내가 주는 물을 마시는 자는 영원히 목마르지 아니하리니 내가 주는 물은 그 속에서 영생하도록 솟아나는 샘물이 되리라

sentences.original_text: But whosoever drinketh of the water
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 누구든지 그 물을 마시는 사람은

sentences.original_text: but the water that I shall give him
shall be in him a well of water
